alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Livingston; St. James (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:22PM CDT until September 07 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... St. James Parish in southeastern Louisiana... South central Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 521 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sorrento, or 9 miles east of Gonzales, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gramercy, Lutcher, Sorrento, Convent, North Vacherie, South Vacherie, and Chackbay. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 182 and 196. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
